casebody.data:
Audrey SAMPSON, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
3M COMPANY, Defendant. (BASF Catalysts LLC-Respondent) M-1187/1242 September Term 2017
080316 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the miscellaneous motion for modification of the Court's order impounding the record pending disposition of the appeal in the Appellate Division (M-1187) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a reply brief (M-1242) is denied.
